15: Attack only
15_s0: Start state
15_s1: Waiting
15_s2: Attack: change the event to your liking
15_s2_w0: [Attack] Melee attack
100: [Test] Acquisition during attack
100_s0: Start state
100_s1: Ground judgment
100_s2: Behavior judgment
100_s3: First Attack * Please change melee attack here
100_s3_w0: [Attack] Melee attack
100_s4: Attack 1st attack
100_s5: Attack 2nd * Change melee attack here
100_s5_w0: [Attack] Melee attack
100_s6: 2nd attack attacking
100_s7: End of attack
